version_description:
- Export to iScanner added. Now you can transfer documents straight to the iScanner app!
We would greatly appreciate if you would take a minute to leave a review on the App Store!

We've updated iFax with new and improved functionality:
- Stability improvements when sending faxes
- Detailed fax status and error messages are now displayed with improved UI

We look forward to your valued feedback on the App Store!

- iOS 10 full support;
- Some minor improvements;
We would greatly appreciate if you would take a minute to leave a review on the App Store!

We've updated Fax from iPhone with some important fixes and improvements:
- Brand new app design allows to create and send faxes a lot faster
- New visual fax grouping based on their status
- Minor fixes and improvements

We look forward to your valued feedback on the App Store!

– Fixed minor issues

We would greatly appreciate if you would take a minute to leave a review on the App Store!

We've updated Fax from iPhone and introduced some important fixes and improvements:
– Added document import from cloud services
– Fax sending screen is now more convenient
– Overall speed improvements

We look forward to your valued feedback on the App Store!

We've made some changes in the new version:
– Brand new, intuitive app design
– iPhone X compatibility

We would greatly appreciate if you would take a minute to leave a review on the App Store!

Here's what we've done in this new version:
– Minor bug fixes and improvements

We would greatly appreciate if you would take a minute to leave a review on the App Store!

Here's what we've done in this new version:
– Minor bug fixes and perfomance improvements

We would greatly appreciate if you would take a minute to leave a review on the App Store!

Thank you for being with us! We've made some changes in the new version:
– UI improvements
– Minor bug fixes and improvements

We would greatly appreciate if you would take a minute to leave a review on the App Store!
